name: Ancillary Motes
summary: You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.
description:
You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.

Special You can take this feat more than once, gaining one more use of Crystalline Dust per day each time.Traits

Aphorite: A type of planar scion descended from a being from Axis, the Plane of Law.
